body: The problem is that the os-dependent [dial](https://github.com/golang/go/blob/519474451a44b861e54466998a893a173bd54c4b/src/net/fd_plan9.go#L35) function isn't called anymore from [dialSerial](https://github.com/golang/go/commit/b6b4004d5a5bf7099ac9ab76777797236da7fe63#diff-af10cab567dbd44651926d200c231fceL422).
